job_tasks.phrase: Setting up a medallion data architecture for analyses workflows
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the design and implementation of data architecture, which is a core component of data engineering for AI/ML workflows.

job_tasks.phrase: implementing pipelines to evaluate LLM prompts
job_tasks.justification: This task explicitly mentions working with LLM prompts and building pipelines for their evaluation, which falls under prompt engineering and RAG.

job_tasks.phrase: implementing pipelines to evaluate classification algorithms
job_tasks.justification: Evaluating classification algorithms is a task related to model development and assessment, fitting into the broader ML specialization.

job_tasks.phrase: design how we store and manually annotate data
job_tasks.justification: This describes the management and preparation of data, including annotation, which is crucial for model training and evaluation.

job_tasks.phrase: maintaining and improve our Conversational AI workflows by automating the data and ml processes
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the automation and improvement of existing workflows, which involves software development and integration principles, even if focused on data and ML processes.

job_tasks.phrase: migrate from a major cloud based conversational AI platform to MS Copilot
job_tasks.justification: Migrating platforms and integrating new systems like MS Copilot falls under software development and integration.
This phrase refers to the application and integration of LLMs into solutions, which is a task related to model development and utilization.

soft_skills.phrase: You will be part of a multidisciplinary scrum team of data scientists, engineers and consultants.
soft_skills.justification: Being part of a multidisciplinary scrum team implies a need for collaboration and communication with diverse roles.

soft_skills.phrase: In the extended team (~50 colleagues) you will be working alongside data engineers, user experience designers, content writers and front- and backend developers.
soft_skills.justification: Working alongside various specialized roles highlights the need for strong communication and collaboration skills.

soft_skills.phrase: We are looking for an enthusiastic colleague that will help us shape the future of Conversational AI
soft_skills.justification: The term 'enthusiastic' and the forward-looking nature of shaping the future suggest a need for eagerness to learn and adapt.

profile.rationale: The job ad describes tasks related to both data engineering (1.B.3) and specific GenAI tasks like evaluating LLM prompts (1.B.2) and empowering solutions with LLMs (1.B.1). It also includes traditional ML tasks like evaluating classification algorithms (1.B.1) and software integration tasks like migrating to MS Copilot (1.A.1). The emphasis on LLMs, conversational AI, and prompt evaluation, combined with data pipeline work, points towards a role that balances AI specialization with engineering practices, fitting the 'Core GenAI Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines responsibilities related to data pipelines, LLM prompt evaluation, and migration to new AI platforms. While it mentions traditional ML tasks, the focus on conversational AI and LLMs is evident. The role seems to blend data engineering with GenAI specialization. The confidence is high, but not perfect, as the exact balance between traditional ML and GenAI could be slightly clearer, and the 'Data Engineer' title might suggest a stronger emphasis on data pipelines than on model development itself, though the tasks listed lean towards GenAI.
